title: Homer's Odysses. Translated according to ye Greeke by. Geo: Chapman
author: Homer.
publisher: By Rich: Field [and W. Jaggard], for Nathaniell Butter,
notes: Another issue, adding books 13-24, of the 1614 edition which includes only books 1-12.
Printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
A cancel letterpress title page is occasionally found, but properly belongs with STC 13624.5.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
